sentence: In early trading on Friday, shares of Hewlett-Packard ( HPQ ) topped the list of the day's best performing components of the S&P 500 index, trading up 6.1%.
Year to date, Hewlett-Packard has lost about 27.7% of its value.
And the worst performing S&P 500 component thus far on the day is Intuit ( INTU ), trading down 11.5%.
Intuit is lower by about 1.2% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Ross Stores ( ROST ), trading down 6.8%, and Salesforce.com ( CRM ), trading up 5.3% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
